description: This file defines and exports a theme object for UI styling, including color constants, shadows, and effects, as well as a utility function for concatenating class names. It specifically relates to the 'Ocean Professional' theme used in a Tic Tac Toe frontend project.

classes.name: Theme
classes.description: TypeScript type defining the structure for the theme object, including colors, shadows, and effects.

methods.name: export function cx(...classes: Array<string | false | undefined | null>): string { cx
methods.description: Utility function to conditionally concatenate class names, filtering out falsy values.

ctags.name: cx
ctags.pattern: /^export function cx(...classes: Array<string | false | undefined | null>): string {$/
